user_instruction: 'Send out a group email with the latest updates on our office environment and workflow changes. You can check out my Gmail and NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.arguments: {"query":"office environment update OR workflow change OR workflow changes","max_results":10,"include_snippet":true,"include_body":false}

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["all-staff@company.com"],"subject":"Upcoming Office Renovation and New Workflow Roll-Out","body":"Hi team,

I hope you're doing well.

Office environment
• Renovation work will begin soon on the ground floor, affecting common work areas and the break room.
• During the renovation, we'll temporarily relocate all workstations to the upper floors. More logistical details will follow.
• We're also coordinating with the facilities group on better lighting and more flexible temperature settings.

Workflow
• Over the next development cycle we'll introduce the AgileBoost workflow, which centers on short iterative sprints, close collaboration, and adaptable processes.
• A brief orientation session and supporting materials will be shared shortly so everyone can get up to speed.

What to expect
• You will receive a relocation plan and sprint-level guidance early next week.
• Please send any questions my way.

Thanks for your flexibility and commitment.

Best regards,
[Your Name]"}

formatted_items.content: A concise update email covering the renovation schedule, temporary workspace move, and the AgileBoost workflow roll-out has been sent to the all-staff list. Let me know if you’d like any changes or follow-up actions!
